With Xiang Fu, for epigastric pain.
Invigorates the Blood, expels Blood Stasis, nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin, strengthens the sinews and bones, benefits the joints and clears Damp-Heat in the Lower Jiao.
Expels Wind-Cold-Dampness, unblocks painful obstruction and alleviates pain.
Breaks up Blood Stasis and invigorates Blood circulation.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood and stops pain due to Blood Stasis.
With Gan Cao, moderates spasms and relieves abdominal pain.
Spreads and regulates Liver Qi and alleviates pain.
With Dang Gui, tonifies the Blood and moves Qi.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, relaxes the sinews, activates the channels and alleviates pain.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
